title: Disrupter
data:
| )   Disrupter   *(No tile)*           |                                                                        |
| ------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                             | [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace")                                              |
|                                       |                                                                        |
| Damage vs. small                      | 1d6+1 **+30**                                                          |
| Damage vs. large                      | 1d6 **+30**                                                            |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+5**                                                                 |
| Bonus versus                          | [undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead")                                        |
|                                       |                                                                        |
| Weapon skill                          | [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace")                                              |
| Size                                  | one-handed                                                             |
| Affiliation                           | - [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")
- [priest](/wiki/Priest "Priest") |
|                                       |                                                                        |
| When carried                          | *(none)*                                                               |
| When wielded                          | *(none)*                                                               |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | *(none)*                                                               |
|                                       |                                                                        |
| Base price                            | 500 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                      |
| Weight                                | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                            |
| Material                              | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                                              |

**Disrupter** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") for wishing purposes. Its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace") in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, and is a [heavy mace](/wiki/Heavy_mace "Heavy mace") in Hack'EM.

## Generation

In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, Disrupter is the first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest"). Any mace created at level generation has a base 1⁄20 chance of being made into Disrupter.

In Hack'EM, Disrupter is the second sacrifice gift for Priests.

## Description

Disrupter has +5 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals +30 damage versus [undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead"). Against undead, this damage bonus exceeds any other weapon, even the famed [Bat from Hell](/wiki/Bat_from_Hell "Bat from Hell").

## Strategy

Disrupter is in a similar niche to that of [Sunsword](/wiki/Sunsword "Sunsword"): the damage bonus covers a somewhat limited range of monsters that still encapsulates several [monster classes](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class") and includes many high-level threats. Most [liches](/wiki/Lich_\(monster_class\) "Lich (monster class)") [vampires](/wiki/Vampire_\(monster_class\) "Vampire (monster class)"), and the various undead spellcasters such as the [ghoul mage](/wiki/Ghoul_mage "Ghoul mage"), [vampire mage](/wiki/Vampire_mage "Vampire mage") and [ghoul queen](/wiki/Ghoul_queen "Ghoul queen") can bring ruin to unprepared players, providing plentiful uses cases for any character not restricted in the mace [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill").

Though Disrupter does not offer additional effects compared to the light-emitting Sunsword, the flat damage is more than enough to secure kills against hostile undead; [enchant weapon](/wiki/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon") scrolls can further improve its hit rate and ensure damage against monsters with [enchantment resistance](/wiki/Enchantment_resistance "Enchantment resistance").

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"Update to reflect THEM/Hack'EM"*

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Disrupter

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   Disrupter   (No tile)
Base item mace
Damage vs. small 1d6+1 +30
Damage vs. large 1d6 +30
To-hit bonus +5
Bonus versus undead
Weapon skill mace
Size one-handed
Affiliation
  • neutral
  • priest
When carried

(none)

When wielded

(none)

When invoked

(none)

Base price 500 zm
Weight 30
Material iron

Disrupter is an artifact weapon that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is neutral for wishing purposes. Its base item is a mace in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, and is a heavy mace in Hack'EM.

Generation

In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, Disrupter is the first sacrifice gift for Priests. Any mace created at level generation has a base 1⁄20 chance of being made into Disrupter.

In Hack'EM, Disrupter is the second sacrifice gift for Priests.

Description

Disrupter has +5 to-hit and deals +30 damage versus undead. Against undead, this damage bonus exceeds any other weapon, even the famed Bat from Hell.

Strategy

Disrupter is in a similar niche to that of Sunsword: the damage bonus covers a somewhat limited range of monsters that still encapsulates several monster classes and includes many high-level threats. Most liches vampires, and the various undead spellcasters such as the ghoul mage, vampire mage and ghoul queen can bring ruin to unprepared players, providing plentiful uses cases for any character not restricted in the mace skill.

Though Disrupter does not offer additional effects compared to the light-emitting Sunsword, the flat damage is more than enough to secure kills against hostile undead; enchant weapon scrolls can further improve its hit rate and ensure damage against monsters with enchantment resistance.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"Update to reflect THEM/Hack'EM"
